properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 3 at 9:12PM PST until February 5 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Active Winter Weather Returns to the Area...

.A Pacific storm system will bring snow to all elevations of the
region beginning Tuesday evening and continuing into Wednesday
before snow levels rise during the afternoon and evening.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to
10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Anatone, Peola, Mountain Road, and Cloverland Road.

* WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
